meanings.definition: A person who makes or fits artificial eyes.
meanings.sent1: The ocularists carefully crafted a new eye for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The ocularists in the clinic create custom-made prosthetic eyes.
meanings.sent3: The ocularists joked that they had an 'eye' for detail in their work.
meanings.sent4: The skill of the ocularists transformed a blank space into a lifelike eye.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the ocularists' work amazed everyone who saw it.

meanings.sent1: The team of ocularists collaborated on a project to fit artificial eyes.
meanings.sent2: The ocularists gathered for a conference to discuss their techniques.
meanings.sent3: The ocularists decided to have a friendly competition to see who could fit the most eyes in a day.
meanings.sent4: The ocularists stood out in the medical field as experts in their craft.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the ocularists to their profession was truly inspiring.
